title: Runaway minicab smashes into three parked cars in quiet London mews
text:
The driver tries to get back in his white Toyota Prius as it speeds up and crashes in cars before coming to a rest on its side

As he gets out to help put a suitcase into the boot the car begins to roll away

Taxi driver pulls up to pick up passenger from home in a west London mews

Shocking footage shows a driver lose control of their car which then smashes into three parked vehicles.

The clip, taken in London, shows the cab driver stopping the car, put his hazards on whilst the engine is still running and go to help a customer.

Suddenly, the car begins to roll down the street accelerating in the process and subsequently crashing into one Polo and two other vehicles on the other side of the street.

The video was posted by London taxi driver Marc Turner on Friday.

Marc says he did not film the footage but believes the incident was filmed in Chelsea or Notting Hill area during the summer.

The clip begins with what is thought to be a Toyota Prius stopping on an attractive mews street as a person with a black suitcase walks towards the car.

The video shows the cab driver stopping the car, put his hazards on whilst the engine is still running and go to help a customer

the car begins to roll down the street accelerating in the process and subsequently crashing into one VW Polo

The driver is then seen putting the hazard lights on, getting out of the car and helping the customer put their suitcase in the boot.

However, the car is soon seen rolling away and hits the Volkswagen in front of it.

As the driver tries to get back into the car to stop it, this only seems to make the situation worse as the car driver picks up speed and moves over to the other side of the road.

An object, thought to be a wheel trim, can be seen flying through the air as the white car drives over the top of one car and ends up hitting the back doors of a van

An object, thought to be a wheel trim, can be seen flying through the air as the white car drives over the top of one car and ends up hitting the back doors of a van.

The passenger can be seen going over to help the driver with bystanders soon appearing on the scene before the clip ends.

The clip has racked up more than 30,000 views with several comments criticising the driver as well as the car.
description: The minicab driver had got out of his car to help a passenger put a suitcase in the boot when the Toyota Prius suddenly begins to roll away towards three parked cars further down the London mews.
